DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare intensive standard training human insulin inhalation powder patient type 2 diabetes .
DOC.brief_title: Comparing Intensive Standard Training Human Insulin Inhalation Powder ( HIIP )
DOC.criteria: Type 2 diabetes least 12 month Age 18 older . Taking least 1 oral antihyperglycemic medication . Have HbA1C 7.5 12 . Be nonsmoker Body Mass Index ( BMI ) great 40 . Have frequent episode severe hypoglycemia . Have advance autonomic neuropathy . Have history asthma . Have chronic obstructive pulmonary disease ( COPD ) .
